Text: There are never enough of good people Cc Dear Jeffrey I came across your name in the business press As an industry leader you are knowledgeable about the latest trends and where the companies are heading You constantly meet top managers and some may be hungry for management talent andor require rapid change action What value can I bring I have nine years of combined experience in management change consulting international marketing and business development Most recently I took part in transforming Fortune companies into more active ebusiness playersB efore in four years I have developed international markets from to over country coverage companies and units mostly in Europe but also in the Middle East and in Asia I am looking for right opportunities and growth challenges If the organization wants to speed up their international expansion and avoid some costly mistakes I can bring in a successful record of developing business and resources in countrytocountry approach balancing thinkglobalandactlocal theme Andor If the organization can benefit from broad range of change experience I led project teams of art designers and copywriters achieving national promotion goals led researches towards addressing relevant issues in their projects led consultants in delivering management change programs for major corporations led the creating of new customer and supplier networks globally These were project teams representing diverse experience background and management levels Andor finally If you would like to share your insiders perspective on where the industry is heading in exchange I can provide my insights into developing business in Europe I am flexible on location and only a phone call away Sincerely yours Robert Rogowski ROBERT ROGOWSKI MBA MA E Redcliffe Gardens London SW BH United Kingdom AHOOCOM SENIOR PROJECT MANAGER CHANGE MANAGEMENT CONSULTANT SUMMARY Senior Project Manager with key skills in the areas of Change Management Communication Management Development Marketing Sales and International Business Development Creative thinker with experience of developing strategies and strategic alliances towards measurable goals Proven leader with a track record of increasing management and consulting responsibility delivering successful results in a constantly changing business environment Background of over nine years in interactive engineering consumer goods and advertising companies Experienced international conference speaker presenter and panel facilitator SELECTED ACHIEVEMENTS General Management Global Marketing Provided leadership in the development of innovative management development programs that enabled company to generate million totaling of the companys revenues for consecutive years at operating margins of Delivered highprofile web development project in months on time below budget The USD project involved integration with the clients back end infrastructure globally tight deadlines and deliverables It involved coordinating efforts of professionals and two offices as well as clients tech team Led the team to develop international market growth from of company revenue in one year Led a team of creative graphic designers copywriters photographers and print managers through all the stages of production of advertising materials for national campaigns on the million consumer market Worked closely with top management and external organizational consultants to develop new incentive structure for the unit The plan resulted in exceeding the revenue targets by International Business Development Established customer base from the inception and promoted growth for consecutive years despite major organizational changes and market shifts The customer network expanded to over companies and units across over countries and continents within years Created a US and European supplier network that enabled the company to continuously improve the efficiency and effectiveness of its management Developed a businesstobusiness Internet campaign that increased customer base by X within years and transformed sales on the Internet from to within years Marketing Sales Identified and negotiated contracts with new vendors for promotional materials for major national advertising campaigns reducing the production cycle by and the company costs by Analyzed sales data for a year period and projected new budget year forecast that was extremely accurate with less than a deviation despite many uncontrollable variables Researched and evaluated merchandising standards promotion effectiveness and pricing levels of business operations using comparative analysis Developed Case for ISPs global market strategy and its implications on the retail industry Designed and marketed a management development program that has encompassed over countries and over managers and covered crosscultural awareness strategy leadership organizational change high speed management communication conflict management and coaching EXPERIENCE iXL Inc iXL UK LTD London United Kingdom Senior Project Manager in Web Site Development Internet Consulting Managed relaunch of Merrill Lynch Investment Managers sites UK Germany and International new creative design and new information architecture integration with Dynabase Client specifically wrote to iXL commenting on the effects Managed the design stage of Morgan Stanley Dean Witter site development project Participated in consulting for Quelle catalog retail chain ABB ASEA BROWN BOVERI LTD Switzerland ABB MANAGEMENT DEVELOPMENT CENTER Falenty Poland Senior Project Manager in Management Development Consultant in Organizational Change Developed international market with the Skills for the Future and other executive development programs Expanded operations by winning external clients Landis Staefa Siemens Daewoo Led the team of professionals to exceed the revenue target by Designed and implemented marketing and sales strategies Developed internet sales channel Analyzed ABB companies and codesigned restructuring programs Benchmarked the HR and training concept of organizations in the US and Europe Designed the number of courses for managers and professionals Established global network with educational organizations and individual trainers COCACOLA INC COCACOLA POLAND SERVICES LTD Warsaw Poland Project Manager in Market Analysis Advertising Sales Promotion Advisor Analyzed market data for eight bottling operations in Poland Prepared sales forecasts for key accounts Codesigned questionnaires and conducted outlet surveys on pricing and merchandising standards Led the outlet survey teams Coordinated point of sale materials design production and nationwide distribution Participated in the selection and implementation of consumer promotion activities SLOAN SCHOOL OF MANAGEMENT MIT Warsaw Poland Project Manager in Research Contract work for Privatization and Firm Restructuring Project Conducted interviews in Polish privatized firms provided general logistic assistance and performed preliminary data analysis EDUCATION MBA International Business School Warsaw Poland Class Rank MA Linguistics Gdansk University Gdansk Poland Executive Courses Negotiation Communicating Organizational Change Leadership Crosscultural Awareness Corporate Finance Conflict Management Coaching Math and Science Courses Chemistry Biology Physics Algebra Geometry SKILLS LANGUAGES English fluent Polish fluent Czech fluent Russian fluent French basic German basic COMPUTER MS Word MS Outlook PowerPoint Excel MS Project Lotus Notes Adobe Access Photo Shop PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT Management Communication and Change Management conferences speaker and presenter panel facilitator published Change Management paper ebusiness conferences and expositions participant business literature translator advertising agency copywriter Organized and led panel discussion Global Management Development in the Corporate Environment Panel members ABB managers Participants MBA faculty and students from EAP European School of Management Warsaw Poland June Attended ebusiness Conference and Expo San Jose Convention Center CA US June Organizers BusinessWeek Information Week Internet Week Network Computing CEBIT Expo and Trade Fair Hannover Germany Authored and presented Maintaining Program Integrity at the Time of Shifting Leadership at Ideas That Matter Management Communication in the st Century conference in Palm Beach FL US May Published in Focus on Change Management journal UK November Authored and presented Evaluating Performance the Skills Program at ABB at Managing Organizational Performance conference in Catania Italy May Translated Becoming a Marketer Conrad Kasperson for International
